page.title: 11Education _ Secondary.
page.content: About 850 pupils attend the Chilton Trinity comprehensive school. We study a variety of subjects including mathematics, sciences, English and foreign languages, history, geography, music, crafts and physical education. Pupils are often taught in 'sets' according to their ability in a particular subject. Some pupils travel up to ten miles to attend our school. Midday meals are available in the school canteen and many children bring home_made sandwiches. A Sports Hall is under construction and will be opened in the autumn of 1986. This will add to the recreation facilities available to the school and the local community. The cost of building the Sports Hall approaches Â£500,000.
